title: Endings Guide
content:
ing is specific to The Dark Urge. As a descendant of Bhaal, you will be forced to face one of his minions, by the name of Orin. Upon winning this battle, Bhaal will take form and present himself to you. Bhaal begins to acknowledge you as his chosen, and thus, he will offer you a gift to use and lacerate the world.
